amount.description: Discount amount in minor currency units (e.g. 100 cents for $1.00 or 100 for ¥100)

AffiliateAttributionSource.description: Context about where the attribution originated.

url.description: Canonical content URL when type is 'url'.

AffiliateAttributionMetadata.description: Flat key/value map for additional non-sensitive context. Keys must be strings; values must be strings, numbers, or booleans. Arrays and nested objects are NOT permitted.

AffiliateAttribution.description: Optional affiliate attribution data for crediting third-party publishers. Write-only: not returned in responses. Forward compatibility: Servers SHOULD ignore unknown fields to support future extensions (per RFC §8.2).

provider.description: Identifier for the attribution provider / affiliate network namespace (e.g., 'impact.com').

token.description: Opaque provider-issued token for fraud-resistant validation. Treat as secret.

publisher_id.description: Provider-scoped affiliate/publisher identifier. Required if token is omitted.

issued_at.description: RFC3339 timestamp when the attribution token was issued.

expires_at.description: RFC3339 timestamp when the attribution token expires.

touchpoint.description: Attribution touchpoint type. Use 'first' when capturing at session creation, 'last' when capturing at completion. Enables multi-touch attribution models.

cost_center.description: Cost center code for internal accounting

member_since.description: RFC 3339 timestamp when the customer joined the loyalty program

certificate_id.description: Unique identifier for the tax exemption certificate

exempt_regions.description: List of regions where the exemption applies (e.g., state codes)

expires_at.description: RFC 3339 timestamp when the exemption certificate expires

InterventionCapabilities.description: Intervention capabilities. Context-specific fields: display_context, redirect_context, max_redirects, max_interaction_depth (requests only). required, enforcement (responses only). supported field contains intersection in responses.

supported.description: Intervention types supported. Agent request: Interventions the agent can handle. Seller response: Intersection of supported interventions.

required.description: Intervention methods required for this session (seller only).

enforcement.description: When required interventions are enforced (seller only).

display_context.description: How the Agent presents interventions (agent only).

redirect_context.description: How the Agent handles redirects (agent only).

max_redirects.description: Maximum number of redirects the Agent can handle (agent only).

max_interaction_depth.description: Maximum depth of nested interactions the Agent can handle (agent only).

Capabilities.description: Capabilities object used in requests and responses. Context determines the party: requests are from Agents, responses are from Sellers. Seller responses contain the intersection of supported interventions.

oneOf.description: Extensions the agent understands (request). Simple identifiers like 'discount'.
Active extensions for this session (response). Objects with name, extends, schema, spec.

extensions.description: Extensions supported by the party. Requests: array of extension identifiers. Responses: array of extension declaration objects.

ExtensionDeclaration.description: Extension declaration in capabilities.extensions (response). Describes an active extension and which schema fields it adds.

extends.description: JSONPath expressions identifying the schema fields added by this extension. Format: $.<SchemaName>.<fieldName> (e.g., $.CheckoutSession.discounts).

schema.description: URL to the extension's JSON Schema definition.

spec.description: URL to the extension's specification document.

PaymentMethodObject.description: Payment method with additional constraints (e.g., card brands, PSP routing)

funding_types.description: For card methods, funding types accepted

unit_amount.description: Price per unit in minor currency units (e.g. 100 cents for $1.00 or 100 for ¥100)

example.content: This product contains small parts and is not suitable for children under 3 years.

name.description: Name of the marketplace seller or vendor
Handler name in reverse-DNS format (e.g., dev.acp.tokenized.card)

requires_delegate_payment.description: Whether this handler requires using delegate_payment API

requires_pci_compliance.description: Whether this handler routes PCI DSS sensitive data

config_schema.description: URL to JSON Schema for handler configuration

instrument_schemas.description: URLs to JSON Schemas for payment instruments

display_order.description: Optional merchant-suggested display order (lower = higher preference). Suggestive only; platform/agent MAY reorder.

id.description: Unique identifier for the line item

item.description: Reference to the item being purchased

quantity.description: Number of units for this line item

name.description: Display name of the line item

description.description: Detailed description of the line item

images.description: Array of image URLs for this line item

unit_amount.description: The unit price of the line item in the smallest currency unit (e.g., cents for USD)

disclosures.description: Legal disclosures or disclaimers for this item

custom_attributes.description: Custom attributes specific to this line item

availability_status.description: Current availability status of the item

fulfillable_on.description: RFC 3339 timestamp when item becomes available for fulfillment

variant_options.description: Selected product variant options (e.g., size, color)

tax_exempt.description: Whether this line item is tax exempt

tax_exemption_reason.description: Reason for tax exemption if applicable

parent_id.description: Reference to parent line item for bundled products

sale.description: Sale extension: per-item sale pricing context. Present when 'sale' extension is active.

discount_eligible.description: Discount extension: whether this item accepts code-based discounts. Present when 'discount' extension is active.

totals.description: Line-item level totals breakdown including base_amount, discount, subtotal, tax, and total

jurisdiction.description: Tax jurisdiction name (e.g., 'California State Tax', 'City of San Francisco')

rate.description: Tax rate as a decimal (e.g., 0.0875 for 8.75%)

amount.description: Tax amount in minor currency units (e.g. 100 cents for $1.00 or 100 for ¥100)

display_text.description: Localized display text for this total

amount.description: Amount in minor currency units (e.g. 100 cents for $1.00 or 100 for ¥100)

presentment_amount.description: Amount in presentment currency minor units if different from settlement currency

description.description: Additional descriptive text for this total

id.description: Unique identifier for this fulfillment option

title.description: Display title for this pickup option

description.description: Additional details about this pickup option

ready_by.description: RFC 3339 timestamp when order will be ready for pickup

pickup_by.description: RFC 3339 timestamp by which order must be picked up

totals.description: Cost breakdown for this fulfillment option

id.description: Unique identifier for this fulfillment option

title.description: Display title for this local delivery option

description.description: Additional details about this delivery option

start.description: RFC 3339 timestamp for delivery window start

end.description: RFC 3339 timestamp for delivery window end

center_postal_code.description: Center point postal code for delivery radius

service_area.description: Geographic service area for local delivery

totals.description: Cost breakdown for this fulfillment option

id.description: Unique identifier for this fulfillment option

title.description: Display title for this shipping option (e.g., 'Standard Shipping', 'Express')

description.description: Additional details about this shipping option

earliest_delivery_time.description: RFC 3339 timestamp for earliest expected delivery

latest_delivery_time.description: RFC 3339 timestamp for latest expected delivery

totals.description: Cost breakdown for this fulfillment option

id.description: Unique identifier for this fulfillment option

title.description: Display title for this digital delivery option

description.description: Additional details about digital delivery method

totals.description: Cost breakdown for this fulfillment option

option_id.description: ID of the selected fulfillment option

item_ids.description: List of line item IDs associated with this fulfillment option

enabled.description: Whether gift wrapping is enabled for this order

charge.description: Additional charge for gift wrapping in minor currency units (e.g. 100 cents for $1.00 or 100 for ¥100)

amount.description: Payment amount in minor currency units (e.g. 100 cents for $1.00 or 100 for ¥100) for this split

id.description: Unique identifier for this fulfillment group

item_ids.description: List of line item IDs in this fulfillment group

destination_type.description: Type of fulfillment for this group

location_id.description: Location identifier for pickup or local delivery

earliest.description: RFC 3339 timestamp for earliest expected delivery

latest.description: RFC 3339 timestamp for latest expected delivery

confirmation_email_sent.description: Whether a confirmation email has been sent

severity.description: Severity level of this informational message

resolution.description: Who resolves this message. 'recoverable': agent can fix via API. 'requires_buyer_input': buyer must provide info. 'requires_buyer_review': buyer must authorize.

code.description: Warning code indicating the type of warning

resolution.description: Who resolves this message. 'recoverable': agent can fix via API. 'requires_buyer_input': buyer must provide info. 'requires_buyer_review': buyer must authorize.

content_type.description: Format of the warning message content

MessageError.description: Business-logic error within a valid CheckoutSession response. Used in messages[] on 2xx responses when the session is valid but has actionable issues (e.g. status "not_ready_for_payment"). The agent can respond by asking the buyer for corrections or trying alternatives. Use MessageError—not Error—when you can return a valid CheckoutSession and the problem is conversational (e.g. invalid email → code "invalid" and param "$.buyer.email"; out of stock → code "out_of_stock" and param "$.items[0]").

code.description: Error code indicating the type of error

resolution.description: Who resolves this message. 'recoverable': agent can fix via API. 'requires_buyer_input': buyer must provide info. 'requires_buyer_review': buyer must authorize.

content_type.description: Format of the error message content

handler_id.description: ID of the payment handler to use

due_date.description: RFC 3339 timestamp when payment is due

ProtocolVersion.description: Protocol metadata included in checkout responses. Indicates the ACP version.

version.description: ACP protocol version in YYYY-MM-DD format.

DiscountAllocation.description: Breakdown of how a discount amount was allocated to a specific target.

amount.description: Amount allocated to this target in minor (cents) currency units.

Coupon.description: Coupon details describing the discount terms.

percent_off.description: Percentage discount (0-100). Mutually exclusive with amount_off.

amount_off.description: Fixed discount amount in minor currency units. Mutually exclusive with percent_off.

currency.description: ISO 4217 currency code for amount_off. Required if amount_off is set.

duration.description: How long the discount applies. 'once' = single use, 'repeating' = multiple billing periods, 'forever' = indefinitely.

duration_in_months.description: Number of months the coupon applies if duration is 'repeating'.

max_redemptions.description: Maximum number of times this coupon can be redeemed across all customers.

times_redeemed.description: Number of times this coupon has been redeemed.

metadata.description: Arbitrary key-value metadata attached to the coupon.

AppliedDiscount.description: A discount that was successfully applied to the checkout session.

id.description: Unique identifier for this applied discount instance.

code.description: The discount code entered by the user. Omitted for automatic discounts.

amount.description: Total discount amount in minor (cents) currency units.

automatic.description: True if applied automatically by merchant rules (no code required).

start.description: RFC 3339 timestamp when the discount became active.

end.description: RFC 3339 timestamp when the discount expires.

method.description: Allocation method. 'each' = applied independently per item. 'across' = split proportionally by value.

priority.description: Stacking order for discount calculation. Lower numbers applied first (1 = first).

allocations.description: Breakdown of where this discount was allocated. Sum of allocation amounts equals total amount.

excluded_items.description: Items excluded from this discount, with reasons.

Sale.description: A sale campaign registered at session level and referenced by line items.

id.description: Stable, opaque identifier for the sale (e.g., 'sale_winter2026'). Referenced by sale.id on line items.

name.description: Human-readable sale label (e.g., 'Winter Sale', 'Black Friday Doorbuster').

description.description: Richer context about the sale. Agents can use this to contextualize the sale for the buyer.

start.description: RFC 3339 timestamp when the sale became effective.

end.description: RFC 3339 timestamp when the sale expires.

metadata.description: Arbitrary key-value pairs. Values MUST be strings.

LineItemSale.description: Per-item sale pricing context. References a session-level Sale by id.

compare_at_amount.description: The regular / 'was' price in minor currency units. MUST be greater than the line item's unit_amount.

lowest_recent_amount.description: Lowest price in the recent period, in minor currency units. Supports EU Omnibus Directive compliance.

lowest_recent_period_days.description: Days covered by lowest_recent_amount (default: 30). Required when lowest_recent_amount is present.

ExcludedItem.description: An item excluded from a discount.

DiscountsRequest.description: Discount codes input for checkout create/update requests.

codes.description: Discount codes to apply. Case-insensitive. Replaces previously submitted codes. Send empty array to clear.

DiscountsResponse.description: Discount codes input and applied discounts output in checkout responses.

rejected.description: Discount codes that could not be applied, with reasons.

RejectedDiscount.description: A discount code that could not be applied, with the reason.

code.description: The discount code that was rejected.

reason.description: Error code indicating why the discount was rejected.

message.description: Human-readable explanation of why the code was rejected.

DiscountErrorCode.description: Error codes for rejected discount codes, used in messages[].code.

user_agent.description: User agent string of the buyer's browser

accept_language.description: Accept-Language header from the buyer's browser

Order.description: Order returned after checkout completion. Contains order details and optional rich post-purchase tracking.

type.description: Discriminator field for webhook payloads. Always 'order' when present.

checkout_session_id.description: ID of the checkout session that created this order

order_number.description: Human-readable order number for customer reference

permalink_url.description: Permanent URL where the customer can view order details

status.description: Order-level status. Can be derived from line item and fulfillment statuses.

line_items.description: What was ordered, with per-item fulfillment tracking

fulfillments.description: How items are being delivered (shipping, pickup, digital)

adjustments.description: Post-order changes: refunds, credits, returns, disputes

totals.description: Order-level totals using the same Total schema as checkout. The 'total' entry is always the original charged amount. 'amount_refunded' tracks cumulative refunds.

OrderLineItem.description: Per-line-item tracking of what was ordered and fulfillment progress.

id.description: Line item identifier, used for references in fulfillments and adjustments

unit_price.description: Price per unit in minor currency units (cents)

subtotal.description: Line total in minor currency units

totals.description: Optional line-item level totals breakdown using the same Total schema as checkout. Merchants who can provide richer breakdowns MAY use this alongside or instead of unit_price/subtotal.

status.description: Derived: processing if shipped=0, partial if 0<shipped<ordered, shipped if shipped=ordered

OrderLineItemQuantity.description: Quantity tracking for an order line item.

shipped.description: How many have been handed to carrier (optional, default 0)

LineItemReference.description: Reference to a line item with quantity, used in fulfillments and adjustments

quantity.description: Quantity in this fulfillment or adjustment

Fulfillment.description: A fulfillment represents how items are delivered to the buyer (shipping, pickup, digital).

status.description: Current fulfillment status. Not all statuses apply to all types.

line_items.description: Which line items and quantities are in this fulfillment

carrier.description: Carrier name (e.g., 'FedEx', 'UPS', 'USPS'). Applies to type: shipping.

tracking_number.description: Carrier tracking number. Applies to type: shipping.

tracking_url.description: URL to track this shipment. Applies to type: shipping.

digital_delivery.description: Digital delivery details. Applies to type: digital.

access_url.description: URL to access digital content (download link, streaming page, etc.)

events.description: Append-only event log tracking fulfillment progress

FulfillmentEvent.description: A point-in-time event in the fulfillment lifecycle.

occurred_at.description: RFC 3339 timestamp when this event occurred

location.description: Location where this event occurred (e.g., 'Memphis, TN')

Adjustment.description: A post-order change such as refund, credit, return, or dispute.

occurred_at.description: RFC 3339 timestamp when this adjustment occurred

line_items.description: Which line items and quantities are affected

amount.description: Total amount credited to the buyer in minor currency units, inclusive of any applicable tax

acquirer_details.description: Details about the acquirer used for this 3DS Authentication. This object MUST be present.

acquirer_merchant_id.description: The Merchant ID assigned by the acquirer.

merchant_name.description: Merchant name assigned by the acquirer.

requestor_id.description: Requestor ID (if required by the directory server).

directory_server.description: The 3DS directory server used for this Authentication.

flow_preference.description: Contains additional details on the seller's preference for the 3DS authentication flow. Sellers MAY request a preference, but issuers ultimately decide the actual flow.

type.description: Type of flow requested for this 3DS Authentication. 'challenge' requests a challenge flow; 'frictionless' requests a frictionless flow.

challenge.description: Details about the requested challenge flow.

frictionless.description: Details about the requested frictionless flow.

AuthenticationResult.description: Agent-provided authentication results returned to the seller for card-based 3D Secure.

outcome_details.description: Detailed authentication data. This field is required when the outcome is 'authenticated', 'informational', or 'attempt_acknowledged'.

three_ds_cryptogram.description: The 3DS cryptogram (authentication value / AAV/CAVV/AEVV). This value is 20 bytes, base64-encoded into a 28-character string.

electronic_commerce_indicator.description: Electronic Commerce Indicator (ECI) returned by the 3D Secure provider. Indicates the degree/type of authentication performed.

transaction_id.description:
Transaction identifier returned by the 3DS system:
- For 3DS1: the XID
- For 3DS2: the Directory Server Transaction ID (dsTransID)

version.description: The 3D Secure version used for this authentication (for example '1.0.2' or '2.2.0').

id.description: Unique identifier for the checkout session

capabilities.description: Negotiated capabilities between agent and seller

status.description: Current status of the checkout session

presentment_currency.description: ISO 4217 presentment currency code if different from settlement currency

exchange_rate.description: Exchange rate from presentment to settlement currency

exchange_rate_timestamp.description: RFC 3339 timestamp when exchange rate was determined

line_items.description: Line items in the checkout session

messages.description: Messages to communicate with the buyer (info, warnings, errors)

created_at.description: RFC 3339 timestamp when the session was created

expires_at.description: RFC 3339 timestamp when the session expires

continue_url.description: URL to continue or resume the checkout session

quote_id.description: Quote identifier if this session is based on a quote

quote_expires_at.description: RFC 3339 timestamp when the quote expires

discounts.description: Discount extension: submitted codes and applied discounts. Present when the 'discount' extension is active.

sales.description: Sale extension: active sales registry. Present when 'sale' extension is active.

order.description: Order created when checkout is completed

line_items.description: Items to add to the checkout session

fulfillment_groups.description: Grouping of items by fulfillment method

affiliate_attribution.description: Affiliate attribution data for first-touch tracking

coupons.description: DEPRECATED: Use discounts.codes instead. Discount codes to apply.

discounts.description: Discount codes to apply to the checkout session.

quote_id.description: Quote identifier if this session is based on a quote

line_items.description: Items to update in the checkout session

selected_fulfillment_options.description: Fulfillment option selected by the buyer

coupons.description: DEPRECATED: Use discounts.codes instead. Discount codes to apply.

discounts.description: Discount codes to apply. Replaces previously submitted codes.

affiliate_attribution.description: Affiliate attribution data for last-touch tracking

reason_code.description: Reason for abandonment. This enum is extensible: servers SHOULD accept unrecognized values and treat them as 'other' (see RFC Section 7.2). Validators SHOULD be configured for lenient enum handling.

trace_summary.description: A generated summary of the specific objection or negotiation gap.

Error.description: Protocol-level error returned in 4xx/5xx responses when the server cannot return a valid CheckoutSession at all (e.g. malformed request or unexpected failure). Use Error—not MessageError—when there is no valid session state to return. type semantics: invalid_request — malformed request, missing required fields, invalid JSON, or idempotency violations (codes: idempotency_key_required, idempotency_in_flight, idempotency_conflict); processing_error — unexpected server-side failure; service_unavailable — temporary unavailability.

type.description: Error type indicating the category of protocol-level error

supported_versions.description: List of API versions supported by the server, ordered by preference (newest first). Only included in version-related errors.
